title: Obsidian MCP Actor Results
description: Results from web scraping and importing content to Obsidian vault with intelligent tagging and linking

success.title: Overall Success
success.description: Whether all processed URLs were successful (true if all succeeded)

processedCount.title: Total URLs Processed
processedCount.description: Total number of URLs processed in this run

results.title: Detailed Results
results.description: Array of results for each processed URL

success.title: URL Success Status
success.description: Whether this specific URL was successfully processed

notePath.title: Note File Path
notePath.description: Relative path to the created note in the vault

title.title: Article/Page Title
title.description: The title extracted from the scraped content

tags.title: Applied Tags
tags.description: Auto-generated and manual tags applied to the note

timestamp.title: Processing Timestamp
timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the note was created

error.title: Error Message
error.description: Error message if the URL processing failed (only present if success=false)
error.example: Failed to scrape https://example.com: Connection timeout
